1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ti wal chi wal in ba ayach.</t>
2: <t>Ach in Diosal, asan ach chach waoc yipok in c'ul. Manchak in a bektok yin mimek q'uixwil. C'am chi yal in c'ul chin tzeyelay yuj eb ajc'ul oc win.</t>
3: <t>Wojtak wali tol masanil mac chach yaoc yipok c'ul, c'am chi el q'uixwil. Elokab q'uixwil eb chi caktzaj oc en yin nabac'al.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Mamin, tx'ox a be ayin; a yin juntzan a be tu' chin etok.</t>
5: <t>Cuyin yin a k'anej yel, yet watx' chin beytok yin watx'il, yujtol in Diosal ach, in Colomal ach. Asan ach chach waoc yipok in c'ul yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, natek a camc'ulal c'al a watx'c'ulal, jun toltac'a max ak' jila'.</t>
7: <t>Axa pax wal juntzan in mul xin, manchakxa a natek. Manchakxa a natek in yobc'ulalil yet max wak'on ach'ejal. Chin a natek Mamin, yin a miman camc'ulal c'al watx'il a c'ul.</t>
8: <pb/><t>A Jehová watx' toni, tojol toni. Yuj tu' xan chi ikbelay oc eb yobtakwom yin beal tojolal.</t>
9: <t>Chi tx'oxlay eb yaynakil yin beybal tojolal yuj Cham.</t>
10: <t>Yuj is camc'ulalil, c'al yuj chi yunc'al tzet max yala', xan chi yikbaj Cham eb chi iken is trato c'al is chekbanil.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Mamin, miman in yobtakilal. Ak' mimanc'ulal win axca max ot aloni.</t>
12: <t>A mactxel ikem bay Jehová, ok cuylay eb yuj Cham yin tzet beal watx' ok yi eb.</t>
13: <t>Toc'alta' ok aj can eb yuj Cham, axa yuninal eb ok sataknej tx'otx' tx'otx'.</t>
14: <t>A Jehová chi yaoc is watx'il animaok eb chi ion aj can Cham, cax chi yak'on Cham yojtaknej el eb is trato.</t>
15: <t>Toc'alta' chi waoc in sat yin Cham, tol a wal Cham ok in colon el yul yal.</t>
16: <pb/><t>Ilintek Mamin, cax ok' wal a c'ul win; ilabi tol in tx'oklil, cax ay in bilc'ulal.</t>
17: <t>Max aj can bilc'ulal yin wanimail; colin el yin in somc'ulal xin.</t>
18: <t>Ilintek yin in cusc'ulal, c'al yin in yailal, cax chak'on tancan el in yobtakilal.</t>
19: <t>Ilab wali tom jantak eb ajc'ul oc win, tol chi yochej c'ul eb chin yak' camok.</t>
20: <t>Taynej in xin, manchak in a cha' camok, manchak in a chatok yin mimek q'uixwil, yujtol a en max in col in ba.</t>
21: <t>Matawal chin a col yuj in watx' beybal, c'al yuj c'am in mul. Ach, ayach oc yipok in c'ul.</t>
22: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, coloncan el ayon Israel on ti' yin masanil co bilc'ulalil.</t>
